entry.title: Amendment 11: Judicial Limits
entry.subtitle: Judicial Limits
entry.extraInfo: Passed by Congress March 4, 1794. Ratified February 7, 1795
entry.notes: Article III, section 2, of the Constitution was modified by amendment 11.

section.text: The Judicial power of the United States shall not be construed to extend to any suit in law or equity, commenced or prosecuted against one of the United States by Citizens of another State, or by Citizens or Subjects of any Foreign State.
